title: Smoked Salmon Pinwheels
directions: Spread approximately 2 tablespoons of softened cream cheese on the tortilla.
Place chives, in a bunch, over the salmon.
Squeeze a little lemon juice over the salmon.
Roll up tightly and wrap in saran wrap.
Place in refrigerator for at least a few hours or overnight.
Unwrap and cut on an angle in Â½" slices.
